Feel free to contact me: michael_elias@apple.com

I cover all software engineering teams across Apple 

Highly effective, driven Sr. Sourcer / Recruiter with the ability to transition seamlessly from business unit to business unit as corporate demand dictates. 

Software: Java, Hadoop, Spark, Cassandra, HBase, Hive, Pig, Flume, Storm, MongoDB, Zookeeper, Machine Learning, LLM's Natural Language Processing (NLP), Clojure, Lucene, Solr, Objective C, C++, C#, Ruby on Rails, JavaScript, Angular.js, Ember.js, Backbone.js, EXT.js, React.js, HTML, CSS, HTML5. CSS3, Python, MySQL, PHP, Perl, .Net, WebKit

G&A:  Finance, Accounting, Business Development, Sr. Editors, Partner Managers, Pricing Managers, Human Resources, Marketing, Contracts, Legal, Pricing & Yield, Account Managers, Account Executives.
position: Lead Technical Recruiter, Sourcing  Apple Inc

experiences.title: Lead Technical Recruiter, Sourcing  - Apple Intelligence
experiences.description:
Lead all of Software Engineering Sourcing for Apple. I work on new initiatives, confidential projects and critical roles. Was responsible for building out the "News" app team, that was announced at the 2015 WWDC. 

I also help with all training and development and best practices for all new sourcers.   

Feel free to contact me:    michael_elias@apple.com

I cover all software engineering teams across Apple

company_data.name: Apple
company_data.description:
We’re a diverse collective of thinkers and doers, continually reimagining what’s possible to help us all do what we love in new ways. And the same innovation that goes into our products also applies to our practices — strengthening our commitment to leave the world better than we found it. This is where your work can make a difference in people’s lives. Including your own.

Apple is an equal opportunity employer that is committed to inclusion and diversity. Visit apple.com/careers to learn more.
locations_list: 1 Apple Park Way Cupertino, California 95014, US

experiences.title: Researcher / Sourcer / Profiler
experiences.description:
Comprehensive cold-calling to identify names, build company organizational charts and recruit candidates to fulfill client’s requests for individuals within specific areas of experience and expertise. 

Additional duties involved selling potential candidates on specific positions, extracting information, and closing their interest level toward specific job functions. 

Employed various sourcing techniques for success.
